message: Bob, I'm offering you a chance to acquire a valuable product that holds significant worth for your business.  I'm confident it will be a game-changer for you, and I'm willing to part with it for $1,000,000. This price represents a substantial opportunity for you to gain significant value, while still allowing me a fair return on my investment. Please consider this offer carefully, as I'm sure you won't find a deal like this again.
